
                            
                            <p>如图所示，WPS有一行字，是逐渐往右下倾斜的，老哥们，怎么调正？<img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/23/160929n501nnowmal5knbc.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202412/23/160929n501nnowmal5knbc.jpg"> <br> </p><p class="pl">哥，你眼睛问题……</p><p class="pl">我看着不斜啊</p><p></p>
